string.text: A strong, waterproof sleeping bag. Probably the most convenient way of spending a night in the Zone. It won't protect you from radiation or bad dreams, but at least it will keep you warm and dry

An economical rucksack designed for day trips. It's vulcanized, so it's waterproof, but it wouldn't survive a serious expedition. However, you could put something inside and hide it for months, making it an excellent stash bag

A strong expeditionary rucksack. It's vulcanized and sewn with UV-treated nylon thread, so it's tough, waterproof, and can carry heavier loads. You could even put something valuable inside and hide it for months, making it an excellent stash bag
Unknown spoils from the 'Last Day' member, Master. It could be dangerous to open or even look inside, dependent on the death's head symbol on the bag...
